snippet: State television reported Wednesday that the world music icon Youssou N’dour has been named the minister for culture and tourism.
abstract: Senegal state television reports that the world music icon Youssou N’dour has been named the minister for culture and tourism.
lead_paragraph: State television reported Wednesday that the world music icon Youssou N’dour has been named the minister for culture and tourism.

headline.seo: Youssou N’dour Is Appointed Senegal’s Minister of Culture and Tourism
headline.main: Senegal: Pop Singer Is Appointed Minister of Culture and Tourism
headline.print_headline: Senegal: Pop Singer Is Appointed Minister of Culture and Tourism
